name: Pirate:Sea of Storms
description:
Many forces lurk the dark and the sea is once more on the verge of chaos. Adventurers, please return to the ocean and write a new chapter to your grand voyage!

◆Assemble your crew
Revisit the manga’s classic stories, collect powerful characters and amazing resources, get stronger, and set sail on a super exciting voyage!

◆Thrilling battles, all-out war
Transcend your limits and use your ultimate skill to defeat mighty rivals! With diverse battle skills and hero matches, no battle can’t be won!

◆Fabulous gifts, fantastic fun
Login to claim massive resources, 5-Star Kuma, 5-Star New World Blackbeard, plus many great surprises! Easy Idle mode, no more burning your eyes out! One game, many ways to enjoy!
